name: Экспресс-кондиционер Gliss Kur Oil Nutritive для волос 200мл
ingredients: aqua, cyclomethicone, phenyl trimethicone, macadamia ternifolia seed oil, prunus armeniaca kernel oil, tocopheryl acetate, panthenol, hydrolyzed keratin, dimethiconol, cetyl peg/ppg- 10/1 dimethicone, polyquaternium-16, lactic acid, cetrimonium chloride, parfum, sodium benzoate, butylphenyl methylpropional, linalool, alpha-isomethyl ionone, coumarin, citronellol, ci 19140, ci 15985, ci 47005
